pr_title: TSK-1451: Add input field to pagination component

timeline.bodyText: please add a type 🙂 and I think it would be nice to have a more meaningful name than 'v'.
timeline.author: sofie29

timeline.bodyText: Suggestion to improve readability: The variable filterValue is only used in this method. You could remove the global variable and and set a local one in this method: const filterValue = v.toString();
timeline.author: sofie29
sofie29
